targetLine.text: Doc, now, you said we were married, right?
targetLine.movie: Back to the Future Part II

contextBefore.text: God, so, like, you weren't kidding. Marty, we can actually see our future.

contextAfter.text: Yeah? Was it a big wedding? Marty, we're gonna be able to see our wedding. Wow. I'm gonna be able to see my wedding dress. Wow. God, I wonder where we live. I bet it's a big house with lots of kids. How many kids...
Doc! What the hell are you doinâ€™?
